subject: Adobe Suite 3 Design only $269
body:
The real meaning of enlightenment is to gaze with undimmed eyes on all darkness.
Now that I am sixty, I see why the idea of elder wisdom has passed from currency.
A constant smirk upon the face, and a whiffing activity of the body, are strong indications of futility.
No person is important enough to make me angry.
Art consists of limitation. The most beautiful part of every picture is the frame.
Footprints on the sands of time are not made by sitting down.
Slumber not in the tents of your fathers. The world is advancing.
Don't count your chickens before they are hatched.
I never worry about action, but only inaction.
There isn't a single human characteristic that can be safely labeled as ''American.''
Our progress as a nation can be no swifter than our progress in education. The human mind is our fundamental resource.
The splendid discontent of God With chaos made the world. And from the discontent of man The worlds best progress springs.
Books give not wisdom where none was before. But where some is, there reading makes it more.
He who opens a school door, closes a prison.
He that complies against his will is of his own opinion still.
But what is all this fear of and opposition to Oblivion? What is the matter with the soft Darkness, the Dreamless Sleep?
A wicked book cannot repent.
Chess is ruthless: you've got to be prepared to kill people.
A good swordsman is not given to quarrel.
